revision.text:
str '''GetActorFloorTerrain''' (int ''tid'')
== Usage == Retrieves the floor's [[TERRAIN|terrain]] name of the [[sector]] in which the actor with the matching [[TID]] is. If ''tid'' is 0, the function is run on the activator of the script.
=== Return value === The function returns the floor's terrain name as a string. If no actor with a matching TID is found, the return value is an empty string.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[category:ACS Information functions]]
